languages.text: {n}Понизив голос, Октавиана добавляет:{/n} "У меня тайное послание для Вашей Светлости. Миссия Касбаллики уполномочила меня выразить их... готовность к дальнейшему сотрудничеству с династией фон Валанциус. Мои коллеги заверяют, что не имеют отношения к деятельности Владайма Токара, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}вызвавшей ваше недовольство{/d}, и не воспринимают постигшие его... личные неудачи как акт враждебности с вашей стороны. Для нас вы по прежнему ценный и уважаемый партнер".

traits.locale_text: {n}Понизив голос, Октавиана добавляет:{/n} "У меня тайное послание для Вашей Светлости. Миссия Касбаллики уполномочила меня выразить их... готовность к дальнейшему сотрудничеству с династией фон Валанциус. Мои коллеги заверяют, что не имеют отношения к деятельности Владайма Токара, вызвавшей ваше недовольство, и не воспринимают постигшие его... личные неудачи как акт враждебности с вашей стороны. Для нас вы по прежнему ценный и уважаемый партнер".

languages.text: {n}Lowering her voice, Octaviana adds,{/n} "I have a private message for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Kasballica Mission has tasked me with expressing their... eagerness to continue their partnership with House von Valancius. My colleagues would like to assure you that they had no stake in Vladaym Tocara's activities that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}incurred your displeasure{/d}, and do not view his... personal misfortunes as an act of hostility on your part. You are, as before, our valuable and respected partner."

You are, as before, our valuable and respected partner."

languages.text: {n}声を下げ、オクタヴィアナが付け加える。{/n}「陛下に個人的なメッセージがございます。カスバリカ聖務団から…フォン・ヴァランシウス家との協力を継続したいとの言伝を預かっています。私の同輩たちは、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}あなたの不興を買った{/d}ヴラダイム・トカラの行動には自分たちは関与していないと証明したいのです…そしてどうか、彼の個人的な不運をご自身の敵対行為のせいだと思わないでください。あなたは以前と変わらず、私たちの価値ある、尊敬に値するパートナーです」
languages.original_text: {n}Lowering her voice, Octaviana adds,{/n} "I have a private message for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Kasballica Mission has tasked me with expressing their... eagerness to continue their partnership with House von Valancius. My colleagues would like to assure you that they had no stake in Vladaym Tocara's activities that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}incurred your displeasure{/d}, and do not view his... personal misfortunes as an act of hostility on your part. You are, as before, our valuable and respected partner."

traits.locale_text: {n}声を下げ、オクタヴィアナが付け加える。{/n}「陛下に個人的なメッセージがございます。カスバリカ聖務団から…フォン・ヴァランシウス家との協力を継続したいとの言伝を預かっています。私の同輩たちは、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}あなたの不興を買った{/d}ヴラダイム・トカラの行動には自分たちは関与していないと証明したいのです…そしてどうか、彼の個人的な不運をご自身の敵対行為のせいだと思わないでください。あなたは以前と変わらず、私たちの価値ある、尊敬に値するパートナーです」

languages.text: {n}Octaviana ajoute en baissant d'un ton :{/n} « J'ai un message privé pour Votre Seigneurie. La Mission de la Kasballica m'a chargée de vous exprimer son... désir de continuer à travailler avec la maison von Valancius. Mes collègues tiennent à vous assurer qu'ils n'avaient rien à voir avec les activités de Vladaym Tocara qui ont {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}provoqué votre mécontentement{/d}, et qu'ils ne considèrent pas ses... malheurs personnels comme un geste hostile de votre part. Vous restez pour nous {mf|un|une} partenaire {mf|précieux|précieuse} et {mf|respecté|respectée}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Lowering her voice, Octaviana adds,{/n} "I have a private message for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Kasballica Mission has tasked me with expressing their... eagerness to continue their partnership with House von Valancius. My colleagues would like to assure you that they had no stake in Vladaym Tocara's activities that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}incurred your displeasure{/d}, and do not view his... personal misfortunes as an act of hostility on your part. You are, as before, our valuable and respected partner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana ajoute en baissant d'un ton :{/n} « J'ai un message privé pour Votre Seigneurie. La Mission de la Kasballica m'a chargée de vous exprimer son... désir de continuer à travailler avec la maison von Valancius. Mes collègues tiennent à vous assurer qu'ils n'avaient rien à voir avec les activités de Vladaym Tocara qui ont provoqué votre mécontentement, et qu'ils ne considèrent pas ses... malheurs personnels comme un geste hostile de votre part. Vous restez pour nous {mf|un|une} partenaire {mf|précieux|précieuse} et {mf|respecté|respectée}. »

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜压低了声音，补充道。{/n}“我还有一条私人信息要转达给你，大人。卡斯巴利卡集团委托我表达……与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝继续合作的热切意愿。我的同僚向你保证，说弗拉迪姆·托卡拉的行为{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}引起了你的不满{/d}，但他们绝对没有参与其中。他们认为弗拉迪姆只是遭遇了……个人不幸而已，这与你的决定都没有一丁点关系。你和以前一样，依然是我们宝贵的、德高望重的合作伙伴。”
languages.original_text: {n}Lowering her voice, Octaviana adds,{/n} "I have a private message for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Kasballica Mission has tasked me with expressing their... eagerness to continue their partnership with House von Valancius. My colleagues would like to assure you that they had no stake in Vladaym Tocara's activities that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}incurred your displeasure{/d}, and do not view his... personal misfortunes as an act of hostility on your part. You are, as before, our valuable and respected partner."

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜压低了声音，补充道。{/n}“我还有一条私人信息要转达给你，大人。卡斯巴利卡集团委托我表达……与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝继续合作的热切意愿。我的同僚向你保证，说弗拉迪姆·托卡拉的行为引起了你的不满，但他们绝对没有参与其中。他们认为弗拉迪姆只是遭遇了……个人不幸而已，这与你的决定都没有一丁点关系。你和以前一样，依然是我们宝贵的、德高望重的合作伙伴。”

languages.text: {n}Mit gesenkter Stimme fügt Octaviana hinzu:{/n} "Ich habe eine private Nachricht für Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Kasballica hat mich gebeten, ihr ... Interesse an einer Fortführung der Partnerschaft mit dem Haus von Valancius auszudrücken. Meine Kollegen möchten Euch versichern, dass sie an Vladaym Tocaras Aktivitäten, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}die Euren Unmut erregt haben{/d}, keinen Anteil hatten, und sie halten sein ... persönliche Missgeschick nicht für einen feindseligen Akt Eurerseits. Ihr bleibt wie zuvor {mf|unser wertvoller und geschätzter Partner|unsere wertvolle und geschätzte Partnerin}."
languages.original_text: {n}Lowering her voice, Octaviana adds,{/n} "I have a private message for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Kasballica Mission has tasked me with expressing their... eagerness to continue their partnership with House von Valancius. My colleagues would like to assure you that they had no stake in Vladaym Tocara's activities that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}incurred your displeasure{/d}, and do not view his... personal misfortunes as an act of hostility on your part. You are, as before, our valuable and respected partner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit gesenkter Stimme fügt Octaviana hinzu:{/n} "Ich habe eine private Nachricht für Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Kasballica hat mich gebeten, ihr ... Interesse an einer Fortführung der Partnerschaft mit dem Haus von Valancius auszudrücken. Meine Kollegen möchten Euch versichern, dass sie an Vladaym Tocaras Aktivitäten, die Euren Unmut erregt haben, keinen Anteil hatten, und sie halten sein ... persönliche Missgeschick nicht für einen feindseligen Akt Eurerseits. Ihr bleibt wie zuvor {mf|unser wertvoller und geschätzter Partner|unsere wertvolle und geschätzte Partnerin}."

languages.text: {n}Octaviana, bajando la voz, añade:{/n} «Tengo un mensaje privado para {mf|milord|milady}. Los miembros de la misión Kasballica me han pedido que le exprese su... intención de continuar cooperando con la casa von Valancius. Además, mis compañeros quieren que le diga que no han tenido nada que ver con las acciones de Vladaym Tocara que le han {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}causado descontento{/d}, y no ven sus... desgracias personales como un acto hostil por su parte. Usted es, como ya lo era antes, {mf|nuestro respetado y apreciado socio|nuestra respetada y apreciada socia}».
languages.original_text: {n}Lowering her voice, Octaviana adds,{/n} "I have a private message for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Kasballica Mission has tasked me with expressing their... eagerness to continue their partnership with House von Valancius. My colleagues would like to assure you that they had no stake in Vladaym Tocara's activities that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}incurred your displeasure{/d}, and do not view his... personal misfortunes as an act of hostility on your part. You are, as before, our valuable and respected partner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana, bajando la voz, añade:{/n} «Tengo un mensaje privado para {mf|milord|milady}. Los miembros de la misión Kasballica me han pedido que le exprese su... intención de continuar cooperando con la casa von Valancius. Además, mis compañeros quieren que le diga que no han tenido nada que ver con las acciones de Vladaym Tocara que le han causado descontento, y no ven sus... desgracias personales como un acto hostil por su parte. Usted es, como ya lo era antes, {mf|nuestro respetado y apreciado socio|nuestra respetada y apreciada socia}».

languages.text: {n}Octaviana, sesini alçaltarak konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Size özel bir mesajım var {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kasballica Misyonu, von Valancius Hanesi ile iş birliğine devam etmeye ne denli... Hevesli olduklarını iletmemi tembihledi. Vladaym Tocara'nın {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}hoşnutsuzluğunuza sebep olan{/d} faaliyetlerinde meslektaşlarımın payı olmadığı konusunda sizi temin etmek istiyorlar. Başına gelen şahsi talihsizlikleri de sizin tarafınızdan gerçekleştirilmiş, husumet güden eylemler olarak görmüyorlar. Eskiden olduğu gibi hâlâ kıymetli ve saygıdeğer bir iş ortağımızsınız."
languages.original_text: {n}Lowering her voice, Octaviana adds,{/n} "I have a private message for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Kasballica Mission has tasked me with expressing their... eagerness to continue their partnership with House von Valancius. My colleagues would like to assure you that they had no stake in Vladaym Tocara's activities that {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymDead}incurred your displeasure{/d}, and do not view his... personal misfortunes as an act of hostility on your part. You are, as before, our valuable and respected partner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana kısık sesle konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Size özel bir mesajım var {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kasballica Misyonu, von Valancius Hanesi ile iş birliğine devam etmeye istekli olduklarını size iletmemi tembihledi. Vladaym Tocara'nın hoşunuza gitmeyen eylemlerinde iş arkadaşlarımın hiçbir payı olmadığı konusunda size temin etmek istiyorlar. Onun başına gelen şahsi talihsizlikleri de, sizin tarafınızdan husumet amaçlı eylemler olarak görmüyorlar. Eskiden olduğu gibi hâlâ değerli ve saygıdeğer bir iş ortağımızsınız."
